description: Update documentation to reflect the implemented runner functionality and the new integration test.

instructions: Read through the existing content to understand the current description of the execution engine.

Based on the changes made to `./src/ai_whisperer/execution_engine.py` to handle plan steps, interact with an AI service, and validate outputs, update the documentation in `./docs/execution_engine.md`.
Specifically, describe how the runner's execution engine now processes plan steps, detailing the flow from receiving a step to executing the agent and handling the output.
Explain how the execution engine interacts with the AI service, referencing the relevant components or modules involved (e.g., `ai_service_interaction.py`).
Describe the process of validating the output from the AI service or agent execution.
Ensure the language is clear, concise, and easy to understand for users and developers.
Locate or create a section related to testing or running examples.
Add instructions on how to run the `simple_country_test`, assuming it's a standard pytest execution or involves a specific script.
Add a new subsection or paragraph mentioning the existence and purpose of the integration test located at `./tests/integration/test_country_runner_integration.py`.
Explain that this integration test is more comprehensive and potentially more expensive (e.g., due to AI service calls).
Provide clear instructions on how to run the `test_country_runner_integration.py` specifically, for users who want to execute it on demand.
Review both `./docs/execution_engine.md` and `./README.md` to ensure the updates are accurate, consistent with the code, and easy to follow.
constraints: Only modify the specified files: `./docs/execution_engine.md` and `./README.md`.
Do not alter any code files.
validation_criteria: The file `./docs/execution_engine.md` exists and has been modified.
The file `./docs/execution_engine.md` contains descriptions of how the execution engine processes plan steps, interacts with the AI service, and validates outputs.
The file `./README.md` exists and has been modified.
The file `./README.md` includes instructions on how to run the `simple_country_test`.
The file `./README.md` mentions the integration test `./tests/integration/test_country_runner_integration.py` and its purpose.
The file `./README.md` provides instructions on how to run the integration test on demand.
